EmailTemplate.name: Banking Drip Campaign.NAMER - Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Banking Tactics That Worked in China
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> China was first to experience the illness—and economic impact—from the novel coronavirus.
Now that they’re re-emerging, there are a few takeaways to consider while working to keep your consumers and small businesses afloat right now. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In a time of uncertainty, count on NCR.Our banking solutions experts are in the trenches with our customers, working hard to help provide guidance, solutions and recommendations <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus]]> during the COVID-19 outbreak.You can find us at NCR.com/banking <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking]]>, have us call you back <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us?path=https://www.ncr.com/retail]]>, call us in the U.S. at 1-800-CALL-NCR or call outside of the U.S. at 1-937-445-1936.
